name: Blue Elephant
description:
protect Patient 0 from the government agents

current version: prototype v0.4

this is a submission for mini jam #105

controls:

punch: \ or enter

blast: spacebar or ctrl or tab

move: w, a , s , d    or   arrow keys

hop on the magic clouds to regain MP

don't let them put Patient 0 in a van

the pointer finger can be killed with your energy blasts

stay tuned 4 updates
